Articles.Content:
As a part of a greater project i have created the Hermes spacecraft from "The Martian" it's not an exact replica but it's pretty close and includes a rotating hab (it's not a smooth bearing because i didnt invest any time in perfecting it but it still rotates. i might come back to this to improve that aspect).

The craft itself is 320 parts and has dV of 2721 m/s in vacuum. DOWNLOAD

Javascript is disabled. View full album

AG 1: toggle solar panels

AG 2: toggle radiators

AG 3: decouple the hab module(you'd need to switch to rotate it)
